title: Bloomberg Markets: Zilkha on the Global Credit Outlook
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Zilkha on the Global Credit Outlook
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Nat Zilkha Co-Head of Credit KKR Discussing his thoughts on the global credit market and "seeking illiquidity", from the Bloomberg Invest New York Summit.
